content: SP-L/M Electroplated Diamond Wire (Concrete & Steel) Premium diamond wire for high speed cutting in reinforced concrete (10-15 kW wire saw) ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Diamond wires, floor saw blades, and wall saw blades- - - ### FEATURES:Features Premium diamond wire with conical beads and reduced bead diameter for maximum cutting speed Engineered for cutting concrete and steel on low to medium power tools Constant outer beat diameter, for easy use of new wire in same cut Robust build from highest grade of materials to increase safety and prevent of fast wear Electroplated wire with 40 beads per meter Applications Cutting reinforced concrete with up to 20% steel content Suitable for low to medium power tools, on soft-to-hard reinforced concrete ### TECHNICAL DATA: Base material: Concrete, Concrete (reinforced), Steel Segment type: Electroplated Wet or dry operation: Wet and Dry Technical Data | Base material | Concrete, Concrete (reinforced), Steel | Segment type | Electroplated | Wet or dry operation | Wet and Dry | Bead diameter | 0.4 in | Number of beads per meter | 40 | Product Class | Premium ### ITEMS- 2305649 - Diamond Wire DS-W 10.2-300 EP SP-L C&S - Package Size 1 pc
